Reviews.Title: ******WARNING***** Only one language option - JAPANESE
Reviews.Author: Varni
Reviews.Content: This camera only has the one language option.  If you don't read Japanese DO NOT BUY THIS camera from this seller. If you do then they do get it to very quickly. Though they aren't prepared to take the item back. Boohoo.

Reviews.Title: Be carefull
Reviews.Author: Jose Luis Fernendez
Reviews.Content: I cant belive. Sorry i dont talk good english, but is not important because this camera only have a menu in JAPANESE if you dont understand japanese is very dificult usefull with the manual. No words ????

Reviews.Title: Best compact camera!
Reviews.Author: jay c.
Reviews.Content: Good! little bit expensive but it worth !  Best point shoot camera in  market right now.  I like this one more than M2.
